review.title: “Great place to work”
review.pros: Pros – Gave all people a fair shake. Fun atmosphere for a while.Mr. John Green is a fantastic person.Gave me a chance at Fort Bragg, and I want to thank them..
review.cons: Cons – Hired and kept people that they liked, instead of keeping people that were good and skilled atthere job.. Hiring Superintendent paid over scale when he did not have too.Division manager had a lot of talent around him,but in the wrong places.Slow to react to obvious manpower issues. (over staffing)
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Listen to all your employees, not just 5 or 6 people..Raleigh division should have done better.
